Title: CASE
Description: CASE 操作符可以根据指定的条件进行条件逻辑判断并自定义查询结果。

CASE
    WHEN condition1 THEN result1
    WHEN condition2 THEN result2
    ...
    ELSE default_result
END
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE d AS (SELECT 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT n+1 FROM d WHERE n<10)
SELECT n, CASE WHEN n MOD 2 THEN "odd" ELSE "even" END FROM d;

Title: IF()
Description: IF() 函数可以根据值或表达式是否为真执行不同的操作。
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE d AS (SELECT 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT n+1 FROM d WHERE n<10)
SELECT n, IF(n MOD 2, "odd", "even") FROM d;

Title: IFNULL()
Description: IFNULL(expr1,expr2) 函数用于处理查询中的 NULL 值。如果 expr1 不为 NULL，该函数返回 expr1；否则返回 expr2。
Examples:
WITH data AS (SELECT NULL AS x UNION ALL SELECT 1 )
SELECT x, IFNULL(x,'x has no value') FROM data;

Title: NULLIF()
Description: NULLIF(expr1,expr2) 函数用于在两个参数相同或第一个参数为 NULL 时返回 NULL。否则，返回第一个参数。
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE d AS (SELECT 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT n+1 FROM d WHERE n<10)
SELECT n, NULLIF(n+n, n+2) FROM d;
